alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Ness; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 10:25PM CDT until July 22 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ness County in west central Kansas... Rush County in central Kansas... Ellis County in central Kansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1025 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Codell to near Schoenchen to 6 miles northwest of Bazine, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Schoenchen, Liebenthal and Munjor around 1030 PM CDT. Loretta and Pfeifer around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Alexander, Otis and Nekoma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
